update config_table_column set column = #{column,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tableid= #{tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createId = #{createid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ts = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ts=#{ts}
mapper.sql: select col.id, col.tableid,col.column, col.desc, col.type, col.createId, col.ts,tab.table_code from config_table_column col left join config_table tab on tab.id=col.tableid
